systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

location.Description: The location of the resource. This will be one of the supported and registered Azure Regions (e.g. West US, East US, Southeast Asia, etc.). The region of a resource cannot be changed once it is created, but if an identical region is specified on update the request will succeed.

tags.Description: The list of key value pairs that describe the resource. These tags can be used in viewing and grouping this resource (across resource groups).

isCancellable.Description: Describes whether the job is cancellable or not.

isDeletable.Description: Describes whether the job is deletable or not.

isShippingAddressEditable.Description: Describes whether the shipping address is editable or not.

isPrepareToShipEnabled.Description: Is Prepare To Ship Enabled on this job

status.Description: Name of the stage which is in progress.

startTime.Description: Time at which the job was started in UTC ISO 8601 format.

error.Description: Top level error for the job.

details.Description: Details of a job run. This field will only be sent for expand details filter.

isCancellableWithoutFee.Description: Flag to indicate cancellation of scheduled job.

additionalInfo.Description: Gets or sets additional error info.

details.Description: Gets or sets details for the error.

message.Description: The error message parsed from the body of the http error response.

target.Description: Gets or sets the target of the error.

info.Description: Additional information of the type of error.

type.Description: Type of error (e.g. CustomerIntervention, PolicyViolation, SecurityViolation).

jobStages.Description: List of stages that run in the job.

contactDetails.Description: Contact details for notification and shipping.

dataImportDetails.Description: Details of the data to be imported into azure.

dataExportDetails.Description: Details of the data to be exported from azure.

reverseShipmentLabelSasKey.Description: Shared access key to download the return shipment label

chainOfCustodySasKey.Description: Shared access key to download the chain of custody logs

keyEncryptionKey.Description: Details about which key encryption type is being used.

expectedDataSizeInTeraBytes.Description: The expected size of the data, which needs to be transferred in this job, in terabytes.

lastMitigationActionOnJob.Description: Last mitigation action performed on the job.

datacenterAddress.Description: Datacenter address to ship to, for the given sku and storage location.

displayName.Description: Display name of the job stage.

stageTime.Description: Time for the job stage in UTC ISO 8601 format.

phone.Description: Phone number of the contact person.

phoneExtension.Description: Phone extension number of the contact person.

mobile.Description: Mobile number of the contact person.

emailList.Description: List of Email-ids to be notified about job progress.

notificationPreference.Description: Notification preference for a job stage.

stateOrProvince.Description: Name of the State or Province.

trackingUrl.Description: Url where shipment can be tracked.

accountDetails.Description: Account details of the data to be transferred

logCollectionLevel.Description: Level of the logs to be collected.

sharePassword.Description: Password for all the shares to be created on the device. Should not be passed for TransferType:ExportFromAzure jobs. If this is not passed, the service will generate password itself. This will not be returned in Get Call. Password Requirements :  Password must be minimum of 12 and maximum of 64 characters. Password must have at least one uppercase alphabet, one number and one special character. Password cannot have the following characters : IilLoO0 Password can have only alphabets, numbers and these characters : @#\-$%^!+=;:_()]+

resourceGroupId.Description: Resource Group Id of the compute disks.

stagingStorageAccountId.Description: Resource Id of the storage account that can be used to copy the vhd for staging.

dataAccountType.Description: Account Type of the data to be transferred.
Account Type of the data to be transferred.

logCollectionLevel.Description: Level of the logs to be collected.

accountDetails.Description: Account details of the data to be transferred

transferConfigurationType.Description: Type of the configuration for transfer.

transferFilterDetails.Description: Map of filter type and the details to filter. This field is required only if the TransferConfigurationType is given as TransferUsingFilter.

transferAllDetails.Description: Map of filter type and the details to transfer all data. This field is required only if the TransferConfigurationType is given as TransferAll

include.Description: Details of the filtering the transfer of data.

dataAccountType.Description: Type of the account of data.

azureFileFilterDetails.Description: Filter details to transfer Azure files.

filterFileDetails.Description: Details of the filter files to be used for data transfer.

blobPrefixList.Description: Prefix list of the Azure blobs to be transferred.

blobPathList.Description: List of full path of the blobs to be transferred.

containerList.Description: List of blob containers to be transferred.

filePrefixList.Description: Prefix list of the Azure files to be transferred.

filePathList.Description: List of full path of the files to be transferred.

fileShareList.Description: List of file shares to be transferred.

filterFilePath.Description: Path of the file that contains the details of all items to transfer.

dataAccountType.Description: Type of the account of data

transferAllBlobs.Description: To indicate if all Azure blobs have to be transferred

transferAllFiles.Description: To indicate if all Azure Files have to be transferred

transportPreferences.Description: Preferences related to the shipment logistics of the sku.

storageAccountAccessTierPreferences.Description: Preferences related to the Access Tier of storage accounts.

preferredShipmentType.Description: Indicates Shipment Logistics type that the customer preferred.

doubleEncryption.Description: Defines secondary layer of software-based encryption enablement.

copyVerboseLogLink.Description: Link for copy verbose logs. This will be set only when LogCollectionLevel is set to Verbose.

copyLogDetailsType.Description: Indicates the type of job details.
Indicates the type of job details.
Indicates the type of job details.

copyVerboseLogLink.Description: Link for copy verbose logs. This will be set only when the LogCollectionLevel is set to verbose.

copyLogDetailsType.Description: Indicates the type of job details.

kekType.Description: Type of encryption key used for key encryption.

identityProperties.Description: Managed identity properties used for key encryption.

kekUrl.Description: Key encryption key. It is required in case of Customer managed KekType.

kekVaultResourceID.Description: Kek vault resource id. It is required in case of Customer managed KekType.

resourceId.Description: Arm resource id for user assigned identity to be used to fetch MSI token.

isPerformedByCustomer.Description:
Action performed by customer,
possibility is that mitigation might happen by customer or service or by ops

supportedCarriersForReturnShipment.Description: List of supported carriers for return shipment.

dataCenterAzureLocation.Description: Azure Location where the Data Center serves primarily.

devicePassword.Description: Set Device password for unlocking Databox. Should not be passed for TransferType:ExportFromAzure jobs. If this is not passed, the service will generate password itself. This will not be returned in Get Call. Password Requirements :  Password must be minimum of 12 and maximum of 64 characters. Password must have at least one uppercase alphabet, one number and one special character. Password cannot have the following characters : IilLoO0 Password can have only alphabets, numbers and these characters : @#\-$%^!+=;:_()]+

jobDetailsType.Description: Indicates the type of job details.

storageAccountName.Description: Name of the storage account. This will be empty for data account types other than storage account.

accountId.Description: Id of the account where the data needs to be uploaded.

totalBytesToProcess.Description: Total amount of data to be processed by the job.

invalidFilesProcessed.Description: Number of files not adhering to azure naming conventions which were processed by automatic renaming

invalidFileBytesUploaded.Description: Total amount of data not adhering to azure naming conventions which were processed by automatic renaming

renamedContainerCount.Description: Number of folders not adhering to azure naming conventions which were processed by automatic renaming

filesErroredOut.Description: Number of files which could not be copied

directoriesErroredOut.Description: To indicate directories errored out in the job.

isEnumerationInProgress.Description:
To indicate if enumeration of data is in progress. 
Until this is true, the TotalBytesToProcess may not be valid.

importDiskDetailsCollection.Description: Contains the map of disk serial number to the disk details for import jobs.

exportDiskDetailsCollection.Description: Contains the map of disk serial number to the disk details for export jobs.

enableManifestBackup.Description: Flag to indicate if disk manifest should be backed-up in the Storage Account.

jobDetailsType.Description: Indicates the type of job details.

manifestFile.Description: The relative path of the manifest file on the disk.

manifestHash.Description: The Base16-encoded MD5 hash of the manifest file on the disk.

bitLockerKey.Description: BitLocker key used to encrypt the disk.

backupManifestCloudPath.Description: Path to backed up manifest, only returned if enableManifestBackup is true.

manifestFile.Description: The relative path of the manifest file on the disk.

manifestHash.Description: The Base16-encoded MD5 hash of the manifest file on the disk.

backupManifestCloudPath.Description: Path to backed up manifest, only returned if enableManifestBackup is true.

storageAccountName.Description: Name of the storage account. This will be empty for data account types other than storage account.

accountId.Description: Id of the account where the data needs to be uploaded.

totalBytesToProcess.Description: Total amount of data to be processed by the job.

invalidFilesProcessed.Description: Number of files not adhering to azure naming conventions which were processed by automatic renaming

invalidFileBytesUploaded.Description: Total amount of data not adhering to azure naming conventions which were processed by automatic renaming

renamedContainerCount.Description: Number of folders not adhering to azure naming conventions which were processed by automatic renaming

filesErroredOut.Description: Number of files which could not be copied

directoriesErroredOut.Description: To indicate directories errored out in the job.

isEnumerationInProgress.Description:
To indicate if enumeration of data is in progress. 
Until this is true, the TotalBytesToProcess may not be valid.

carrierAccountNumber.Description: Carrier Account Number of customer for customer disk.

preferredDisks.Description: User preference on what size disks are needed for the job. The map is from the disk size in TB to the count. Eg. {2,5} means 5 disks of 2 TB size. Key is string but will be checked against an int.

disksAndSizeDetails.Description: Contains the map of disk serial number to the disk size being used for the job. Is returned only after the disks are shipped to the customer.

passkey.Description: User entered passkey for DataBox Disk job.

jobDetailsType.Description: Indicates the type of job details.

serialNumber.Description: The serial number of the disk

bytesCopied.Description: Bytes copied during the copy of disk.

percentComplete.Description: Indicates the percentage completed for the copy of the disk.

storageAccountName.Description: Name of the storage account. This will be empty for data account types other than storage account.

accountId.Description: Id of the account where the data needs to be uploaded.

totalBytesToProcess.Description: Total amount of data to be processed by the job.

invalidFilesProcessed.Description: Number of files not adhering to azure naming conventions which were processed by automatic renaming

invalidFileBytesUploaded.Description: Total amount of data not adhering to azure naming conventions which were processed by automatic renaming

renamedContainerCount.Description: Number of folders not adhering to azure naming conventions which were processed by automatic renaming

filesErroredOut.Description: Number of files which could not be copied

directoriesErroredOut.Description: To indicate directories errored out in the job.

isEnumerationInProgress.Description:
To indicate if enumeration of data is in progress. 
Until this is true, the TotalBytesToProcess may not be valid.

devicePassword.Description: Set Device password for unlocking Databox Heavy. Should not be passed for TransferType:ExportFromAzure jobs. If this is not passed, the service will generate password itself. This will not be returned in Get Call. Password Requirements :  Password must be minimum of 12 and maximum of 64 characters. Password must have at least one uppercase alphabet, one number and one special character. Password cannot have the following characters : IilLoO0 Password can have only alphabets, numbers and these characters : @#\-$%^!+=;:_()]+

jobDetailsType.Description: Indicates the type of job details.

createdBy.Description: A string identifier for the identity that created the resource

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource: user, application, managedIdentity

lastModifiedBy.Description: A string identifier for the identity that last modified the resource

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource: user, application, managedIdentity

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

displayName.Description: The display name of the sku.

principalId.Description: Service Principal Id backing the Msi
The principal id of user assigned identity.

clientId.Description: The client id of user assigned identity.

nextLink.Description: Link for the next set of unencrypted credentials.

dcAccessSecurityCode.Description: Dc Access Security Code for Customer Managed Shipping

podSecrets.Description: Contains the list of secret objects for a job.

jobSecretsType.Description: Used to indicate what type of job secrets object.

deviceSerialNumber.Description: Serial number of the assigned device.

devicePassword.Description: Password for out of the box experience on device.

encodedValidationCertPubKey.Description: The base 64 encoded public key to authenticate with the device

accountConnectionString.Description: Connection string of the account endpoint to use the account as a storage endpoint on the device.

shareCredentialDetails.Description: Per share level unencrypted access credentials.

supportedAccessProtocols.Description: Access protocols supported on the device.

diskSecrets.Description: Contains the list of secrets object for that device.

carrierAccountNumber.Description: Carrier Account Number of the customer

jobSecretsType.Description: Used to indicate what type of job secrets object.

diskSerialNumber.Description: Serial number of the assigned disk.

bitLockerKey.Description: Bit Locker key of the disk which can be used to unlock the disk to copy data.

diskSecrets.Description: Contains the list of secrets object for that device.

isPasskeyUserDefined.Description: Whether passkey was provided by user.

jobSecretsType.Description: Used to indicate what type of job secrets object.

cabinetPodSecrets.Description: Contains the list of secret objects for a databox heavy job.

jobSecretsType.Description: Used to indicate what type of job secrets object.

deviceSerialNumber.Description: Serial number of the assigned device.

devicePassword.Description: Password for out of the box experience on device.

encodedValidationCertPubKey.Description: The base 64 encoded public key to authenticate with the device
